game.name: Whitestone
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: On the 'Sunchaser' capstone voyage to the Arctic, it's smooth sailing until Jack's quarters are broken into and his friend goes missing. Unsure who to trust, Jack is forced to fight nightmares both mental and physical as he becomes the prime suspect for a terrible deed.
